Ombi.description:
Host your own Plex Request and user management system.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run Ombi as.

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Ombi as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run Ombi as.
